roleset.name: to utter a moan or complain
roleset.note: MOAN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'moan' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from moan.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: prepositional Arg1
example.text: The next time [0] you hear a Member of Congress moan about the deficit [*T*-2], [*] consider what Congress did [*T*-1] Friday .

example.name: non-prepositional Arg1
example.text: [`` I 'm too old [0] [*T*-1]to waste a weekend , but that 's what I did [*T*-2] , ''] -3 the 48-year-old Mr. Juliano moans [*T*-3] .

example.name: Arg0
example.text: John Swinney can stop his moaning when he gets the cold shoulder.
example.arg: when he gets the cold shoulder
